titles.title: To prohibit the awarding of discretionary grants to institutions of higher education that will use the grant award for indirect costs.
To prohibit the awarding of discretionary grants to institutions of higher education that will use the grant award for indirect costs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits federal agencies from distributing a grant to an institution of higher education under a competitive discretionary grant program if any part of the grant is used for indirect costs (e.g. overhead, administrative fees, or research).
